select su.id userid, su.username, su.realname, dept.id pkDept, dept.depart_name nameDept from sys_user su
inner join sys_user_depart sud on su.id = sud.user_id inner join sys_depart dept on sud.dep_id = dept.id where username = #{code}
SELECT d.depart_name, d.id, d.memo FROM check_machine cm JOIN sys_depart d ON FIND_IN_SET(d.id, cm.signable_dept) > 0 WHERE cm.mac_address = #{mac}
select room.room_number, su.realname, room.id, dd.doctor from rooms room left join doctor_device dd on dd.room = room.id left join sys_user su on su.id = dd.doctor where room.department = #{id}

SELECT qu.id, qu.queue_number, qu.patient, qu.queue_status, qu.queue_priority, qu.check_time, pa.name, CASE WHEN pa.gender = 1 THEN '男' ELSE '女' END AS gender FROM queues qu LEFT JOIN patients pa ON pa.id = qu.patient
where qu.doctor = #{id}
